rule: A deck can have 0–N themes; themes are not mutually exclusive
why: Matches reality; improves UX and retrieval

rule: Themes derive from primitives+facets+motifs; never hand-tagged at runtime
Some themes can trigger from 1–2 signpost cards (e.g., POD, SUNFORGER) but must be explicit
Do not include cEDH / power-level themes as first-class tags
Theme assignment stores contributing primitive counts and top contributing cards
